body:
US Army Sgt Bowe Bergdahl was captured in Afghanistan on June 30, 2009 by enemy forces. Today he remains a Prisoner of War. 

Sgt Bergdahl will be 27 on March 28. Tell America about Bowe's plight as a prisoner of Taliban forces. Raise awareness for Bowe.  It's time all of America know who Bowe is.
title: Raise awareness for US Army Sgt Bowe Bergdahl
